dcterms:creator: X. Li
Y. N. Chen
L. Li
J. Gao
dcterms:description: An open task-completion dialogue dataset for movie ticket booking, where the system gathers information about customer desires and books movie tickets. The success or failure of dialogue is assessed based on whether a movie is booked and whether it satisfies the user's constraints. The dataset includes 11 dialogue acts, 29 slots, and 277 user goal templates.
dcterms:title: Movie Booking Dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Li
Y. N. Chen
L. Li
J. Gao
dcterms:description: A dataset for restaurant reservation dialogues, where users reserve a table based on their requirements. The dataset includes 11 dialogue acts, 24 slots, and 184 user goal templates, designed to facilitate the training of dialogue systems.
dcterms:title: Restaurant Reservation Dataset
